Sand Kingdom.requires: |Power Moon:5| or (|Cascade Kingdom Power Moon:5| OR ( |Cascade Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Cascade Kingdom Power Moon:2| ))

Post-Sand.requires: |Power Moon:21| or (|Sand Kingdom Power Moon:16| OR ( |Sand Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:13| ) OR ( |Sand Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Sand Kingdom Power Moon:10| ))

Lake Kingdom.requires: |Power Moon:45| or (|Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:16| OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:13| ) OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:10| ))

Post-Lake.requires: |Power Moon:45| or (|Lake Kingdom Power Moon:8| OR ( |Lake Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Lake Kingdom Power Moon:5| ))

Wooded Kingdom.requires: |Power Moon:45| or (|Lake Kingdom Power Moon:8| OR ( |Lake Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Lake Kingdom Power Moon:5| ))

Post-Wooded.requires: |Power Moon:45| or (|Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:16| OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:13| ) OR ( |Wooded Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Wooded Kingdom Power Moon:10| ))

Post-Metro.requires: (|Power Moon:75| or ( ( |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:20| OR ( |Metro Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:17| ) OR ( |Metro Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Metro Kingdom Power Moon:14| ) ) )) and {OptOne(Sherm)}

Post-Snow.requires: |Power Moon:95| or (|Snow Kingdom Power Moon:10| OR ( |Snow Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Snow Kingdom Power Moon:7| ))

Post-Seaside.requires: |Power Moon:95| or (|Seaside Kingdom Power Moon:10| OR ( |Seaside Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Seaside Kingdom Power Moon:7| ))

Ruined Kingdom.requires: |Power Moon:113| or (( |Luncheon Kingdom Power Moon:18| OR ( |Luncheon Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Luncheon Kingdom Power Moon:15| ) OR ( |Luncheon Kingdom Multi-Moon:2| AND |Luncheon Kingdom Power Moon:12| ) ))

Bowser's Kingdom.requires: |Power Moon:116| or (|Ruined Kingdom Power Moon:3| OR |Ruined Kingdom Multi-Moon|)

Moon Kingdom.requires: |Power Moon:124| or (( |Bowser's Kingdom Power Moon:8| OR ( |Bowser's Kingdom Multi-Moon| AND |Bowser's Kingdom Power Moon:5| ) )) and {OptOne(|Pokio|)}
